properties.title: Rifugio Saoseo CAS
properties.description: The cabin is located in the centre of Val Di Campo, surrounded by larches and Swiss stone pines, turquoise lakes and lively brooks. The environs of the large stone building are perfect for families, small and larger groups, climbers, hikers, bikers, ski mountaineers and nature lovers. The cabinâ€™s interior is simple, but functional. On the menu: Puschlav specialties and, of course, Valtellina wines. In summer there is a bus and a SchweizMobil mountain bike route to Alp Camp.
